name: issue-parser
title: Issue Parser
description: Easily parse issue URLs (from Jira or GitHub) to generate commit names and descriptions for use with Git
author: julesjuul

commands.name: parse-issue-url
commands.title: Parse Issue URL
commands.description: Parse the URL to get the id formatted for a commit message

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
